item.description:
For two weeks ONLY the movie Michael Jackson THIS IS IT will be playing in movie theatres. I've chosen for us to see it at CinemaWorld in Lincoln RI - Sunday, November 1st at 11:15 am..............Tickets should be purchased online as soon as possible before it sells out. Let me know your interest by replying with a YES ! We can go out for lunch after the movie at Chili's which is right in the same parking lot!

Purchase tickets here: http://www.cinemaworl...
item.how_to_find_us: MEET IN THEATRE LOBBY 'THIRTY' MINUTES PRIOR TO START OF SHOW - SEE YOU AT 10:45 AM THERE!
item.name: THIS IS IT
